analyzed: ma skyes rang rig ye shes ni/_/rtshal rdzogs rol pa rang snang bas/_/grangs

analyzed: bzangs ril phyir blang dor med/_/gang yang sems la gzhan min pas/_/

analyzed: 'bral med pa'i bde chen po/_/sangs ma rgyas pa cig med pa'o/_/mang nyung

analyzed: lta sogs khyad par 'phags/_/rnal 'byor ming gsum gzhung nyid/_/dngos

analyzed: las grol/_/ye shes nam mkha' dbus mtha' med/_/de bzhin nyid gshegs

analyzed: yang dag rdzogs/_/tha snyad gnyis kyi chos rnams ril/_/mnyam rdzogs

analyzed: nyid kyang mdor bstan na/_/chos sems ye nas gnyis su med/_/thams cad

analyzed: ma 'dres yongs rdzogs pa/_/cir snang ci yang ma yin te/_/btsham bzhi byas

analyzed: phyir nges tshhig ldan/_/yul bral gnyis med rang mi dmigs/_/kun bzang

analyzed: nyid kyis bstan dka' la/_byed po chos can skad cig dang /_/sgyu snang rtogs

analyzed: pa'i rigs snang dang /_/brlabs dang cho 'phrul rtshal snang ba/_/'di la gdod

analyzed: nas yod ma yin/_/rig pa bzhi snang brlabs sogs pa/_/bltas pa tsham ste

analyzed: bye brag med/_/rgyu nyid rdo rje rkyen de bzhin/_/des na skye med 'gags

analyzed: sogs stong /_/bdag las gzhan pa mi snang zhing /_/bdag kyang 'di 'dra mi

analyzed: dmigs pas/_/snang med stong pa chen por gsungs/_/gnyis bsdus brjod

analyzed: snang thams cad kun/_/mi 'gog sems la gzhal med pas/_/'dogs snang

analyzed: brtags par rung ma yin/_/rnam pa kun ldan stong chen po/_/sangs rgyas pas

analyzed: brtags nas brtags snang phyir/_/thams cad kun snang gzhi rtshar bshad/_/

analyzed: gang la'ang gdod nas yod min pas/_/brtags rnams khyi bus khyi tshhul gsungs//

analyzed: thams cad sems gsal de bzhin nyid/_/ma byas rgyun min phyogs med gsal/_/

analyzed: ye shes ming bzhi'i rang bzhin nyid/_/mtha' bral bsam pa'i yul 'das pas/_/

analyzed: thig le chen po gcig tu nyid/_/ther zug rgyun las ye nas grol/_/don dam

analyzed: nor bdun gzhan 'dod pa'ang /_/gdul bya'i ngo bo 'dod pa min/_/gang

analyzed: yang dam par mi lta na/_/ci bsams skyon med bya lam dang /_/rgyu shes slu ba

analyzed: med pa bzhin/_/'di la gol sa yod ma yin/_/mnyam rdzogs bdag nyid chen
translated: because of the greatness of the nature of perfect equality.🔽Beyond the designations of the two truths,

analyzed: po'i phyir/_/bden pa gnyis kyi snyad las 'das/_/bzhi gnyis spros bral chos

analyzed: kyi dbyings/_/rang bzhin gyis stong de bzhin nyid/_/gdod nas skye ba med

analyzed: pa'i ngang /_/rigs bzhis nges pa don dam dngos/_/bla med mi gnas nges

analyzed: dngos kun ma bcos sems gsal ba/_/ma nor ma bcos de bzhin nyid/_/

analyzed: de sogs bltos brtags brjod bral ba'o/_/ming bzhi sogs mtshhon shes bya nyid/

analyzed: ye nas yin zhes ye shes kyang /_/gnas 'gyur lam dang 'bras skabs su/_/

analyzed: rnal sogs stong nyid ye shes dang /_/don shes skabs kyi ye shes bzhis/_/
translated: The four wisdoms—the wisdom of the emptiness of the all-base and so forth,🔽the wisdom of the all-base, the wisdom of the path, and the wisdom of the result—🔽are the four wisdoms of the all-base and so forth.

original: don drangs kyis kyang khyad par 'gyur/_/kun ye rang rig shes gsal ba/_/
analyzed: don drangs kyis kyang khyad par 'gyur/_/kun ye rang rig shes gsal ba/_/
translated: The all-knowing, self-knowing, clear consciousness🔽Is the certainty that is not obscured by anything.

original: cis kyang ma bsgribs nges pa'i tshhig_/rang byung rang rig dbyings mi gnas/_/
analyzed: cis kyang ma bsgribs nges pa'i tshhig_/rang byung rang rig dbyings mi gnas/_/
translated: The self-arisen, self-knowing, space does not abide.🔽Because of the four names, there is no one thing,

analyzed: skabs ming bzhi phyir gcig med la/_/chos kun ma 'dres bdag gsal phyir/
translated: And because of the clarity of the self of all phenomena,🔽The enumerations of wisdom are inconceivable.

analyzed: ye shes rnam grangs bsam mi khyab/_/yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi 'ang /_/
translated: The wisdom of the perfect, complete Buddha🔽Does not have an object of wisdom and does not know anything.

analyzed: ye shes yul med cang mi shes/_/ma lus bdag gsal rtog med pa/_/ye shes
translated: The clarity of the self of all without exception is nonconceptual wisdom.

original: ming gnyis dngos gcig pa'o//_//
analyzed: ming gnyis dngos gcig pa'o//_//
translated: The two names are one thing.🔽When this meaning is seen,

analyzed: gang gis don 'di mthong gyur na/_/de bzhin nyid gshegs kho na'i phyir/_/
translated: Because of going to suchness itself,

analyzed: ji bzhin pa'i dngos de bzhin/_/rtogs gnyis grol ba'i ye shes sku/_/ngo bo
translated: The wisdom kāya of realizing the suchness of the way things are🔽Is the permanent essence that is beyond expression.

original: nyid rtag brjod las 'das/_/brtags sogs thad ka'i chos kun yang /
analyzed: nyid rtag brjod las 'das/_/brtags sogs thad ka'i chos kun yang /

analyzed: sems phyir yod min ma dmigs pas/_/blang dor byed dang don gyis bral/_/
translated: Since they are not observed, they are free from the meaning of adopting and rejecting.

analyzed: 'du shes rang gzhin ye shes kyang /_/'du shes thams cad 'byung mi 'gyur/_/
translated: But all perceptions will not arise.🔽The sun of manifest, self-arisen primordial wisdom

original: rang 'byung ye shes mngon byes pa'i/_/nyi ma bye ba 'od brdal yang /_/dus
analyzed: rang 'byung ye shes mngon byes pa'i/_/nyi ma bye ba 'od brdal yang /_/dus

analyzed: dang rnam pa thams cad du/_/sangs rgyas par bya byed med pa'i/_/chos ni

original: rdul tsham yod min pas/_/sangs rgyas med pa'i tshher bas gsungs/_/bskal
analyzed: rdul tsham yod min pas/_/sangs rgyas med pa'i tshher bas gsungs/_/bskal

original: pa'i grangs dang tshhe rabs su/_/dman pa'i blang dor ci byas dang /_/'bring
analyzed: pa'i grangs dang tshhe rabs su/_/dman pa'i blang dor ci byas dang /_/'bring
translated: For eons and eons, whatever the inferior do in terms of adopting and rejecting,🔽And whatever the middling attain through observation,

original: gis dmigs pas grol thob kyang /_/don 'di nyams su ma myong na/_/brtags
analyzed: gis dmigs pas grol thob kyang /_/don 'di nyams su ma myong na/_/brtags

original: pa nyid las ma gtogs par/_/spangs thob ngo bo gdod nas med/_/dngos
analyzed: pa nyid las ma gtogs par/_/spangs thob ngo bo gdod nas med/_/dngos
translated: Apart from that, there is no essence of abandonment or attainment from the beginning.

original: drug dmigs dang gzhan don gyi/_/'du shes rgyun dang bya las grol/_/bdag
analyzed: drug dmigs dang gzhan don gyi/_/'du shes rgyun dang bya las grol/_/bdag
translated: The six topics are free from the continuum of perception and the activity of the benefit of others.🔽The infinite buddhas of the self

original: gi mu mtha' yas sangs rgyas/_/ji bzhin der gyur kun bdag rdzogs/_/de
analyzed: gi mu mtha' yas sangs rgyas/_/ji bzhin der gyur kun bdag rdzogs/_/de

analyzed: bzhin gshegs pa yang dag rdzogs/_/de sogs tha snyad tsham du zad/_/dman

analyzed: 'bras sku dang ye shes mchog_/dngos nyid shin tu rnam dag dang /_/gnyen
translated: The supreme result is the kāyas and primordial wisdoms, the nature of which is utterly pure,🔽and the benefit for others is the knowledge that is in accord with reality.

original: med don bzhin rnam par shes/_/ming gsum ldan 'di mchog gi gzhung /
analyzed: med don bzhin rnam par shes/_/ming gsum ldan 'di mchog gi gzhung /

analyzed: tshhogs brgyad la sogs chos kun dang /_/dngos cig bsal bas tha dad pa/_/
translated: All phenomena, such as the eight collections, are one entity, but by being eliminated, they are different.

original: dngos med ye shes sna tshhogs can/_/dngos nyid chos kun ldan bral min/
analyzed: dngos med ye shes sna tshhogs can/_/dngos nyid chos kun ldan bral min/
translated: The nonentity is the various primordial wisdoms. The nature is neither endowed with nor separate from all phenomena.

original: las shan lta ba'i sgron ma zhes bya ba
analyzed: las shan lta ba'i sgron ma zhes bya ba
translated: The Lamp of the View of the Divisions of Karma

original: don 'di rnal 'byor mngon sum mo//_//
analyzed: don 'di rnal 'byor mngon sum mo//_//
translated: This meaning is the direct perception of a yogi.

original: mchog gis rang rig mngon sum du/_/rang grol gsal thob gnyis las🔽'das/_/ngo bo bsam rdzogs ril dang bral/_/sangs rgyas kyis kyang bstan
analyzed: mchog gis rang rig mngon sum du/_/rang grol gsal thob gnyis las 'das/_/ngo bo bsam rdzogs ril dang bral/_/sangs rgyas kyis kyang bstan
translated: The supreme one is beyond the two—the direct perception of self-awareness and the attainment of clarity of self-liberation.🔽The essence is difficult for even the buddhas to teach because it is free from all conceptual thoughts.

original: dka' ba/_/dman don gzhung gis ga la rdzogs/_/de'i rjes 'jug tshhad dag
analyzed: dka' ba/_/dman don gzhung gis ga la rdzogs/_/de'i rjes 'jug tshhad dag
translated: How could the purpose of the inferior be complete with the scriptures?

original: kyang /_/dngos de nyid la rnam med kyang /_/rang bzhin las kyi rtshal rim pas//
analyzed: kyang /_/dngos de nyid la rnam med kyang /_/rang bzhin las kyi rtshal rim pas//
translated: and the karmic reasons,

original: bcos phyogs sbyangs rgyud thabs rtshal gyis/_/mi bzlog rim pa sngon bya'i phyir/_/
analyzed: bcos phyogs sbyangs rgyud thabs rtshal gyis/_/mi bzlog rim pa sngon bya'i phyir/_/
translated: the stages of the path of purification, and the method of the tantra.🔽  Although everyone speaks of knowing the thing itself

original: gtan tshhigs bzhis sogs rims bkod pas/_/dngos de nyid shes kun smra yang /_/
analyzed: gtan tshhigs bzhis sogs rims bkod pas/_/dngos de nyid shes kun smra yang /_/
translated: through the sequence of the four reasons and so forth,🔽the meaning of freedom from reasons is not known.

original: brtshal bral bya med don ma rig_/rjes sogs ltos ltas kho nar snang /_//
analyzed: brtshal bral bya med don ma rig_/rjes sogs ltos ltas kho nar snang /_//
translated: The supreme is seen only through the view of dependence,🔽such as the view of the aftermath and so forth.🔽  The thing itself is not measured by the individual🔽measures of four and so forth.

original: mchog gzhung gi tshhad gsum nyid/_/bzhi sogs so so'i tshhad ma yis/_/dngos
analyzed: mchog gzhung gi tshhad gsum nyid/_/bzhi sogs so so'i tshhad ma yis/_/dngos
translated: The thing itself is not measured by the measure of🔽the place and so forth,🔽which are not the thing itself.

original: de nyid sogs gang de nyid/_/gnas min tshhad dang de ru mtha'/_/spangs pa'i
analyzed: de nyid sogs gang de nyid/_/gnas min tshhad dang de ru mtha'/_/spangs pa'i
translated: The measure of the thing itself is like the🔽mark of the bull,🔽which is self-awareness.🔽  Therefore, all paths are the domain of the wise.

original: rang rig gang yin pa/_/khyu mchog mdo ris lta bus tshhad/_/de phyir lam kun
analyzed: rang rig gang yin pa/_/khyu mchog mdo ris lta bus tshhad/_/de phyir lam kun
translated: The measure of confidence is said to be🔽the measure of the experience

original: mkhas spyod yul/_/nam mkha' rmad sogs rjes mthun par/_/myong ba'i🔽nyams bsdur mi 'gal rigs/_/tshhig spangs yid ches tshhad mar gsungs/_/
analyzed: mkhas spyod yul/_/nam mkha' rmad sogs rjes mthun par/_/myong ba'i🔽nyams bsdur mi 'gal rigs/_/tshhig spangs yid ches tshhad mar gsungs/_/
translated: that accords with the sky, the marvelous, and so forth.

original: ma lus sems phyir snang mi 'dzin/_/ci yang min phyir cir mi gnas/_/thams
analyzed: ma lus sems phyir snang mi 'dzin/_/ci yang min phyir cir mi gnas/_/thams
translated: Since there is nothing at all, there is no way that anything can be.🔽Since everything is the self, there is no attainment or abandonment.

original: cad bdag phyir thob spangs med/_/bdag gzhan don bral cang mi 'gog_/
analyzed: cad bdag phyir thob spangs med/_/bdag gzhan don bral cang mi 'gog_/
translated: Since there is no benefit for self or other, there is no negation of anything.

original: lta bsgom 'bras bcas gtan tshhigs mod/_/rgyas par mdo bzhi me long dang // nges bdun nges zin gtan tshhigs drug_/tshhul gyis nges pa bcu gnyis sogs/_/
analyzed: lta bsgom 'bras bcas gtan tshhigs mod/_/rgyas par mdo bzhi me long dang // nges bdun nges zin gtan tshhigs drug_/tshhul gyis nges pa bcu gnyis sogs/_/
translated: The four tantras, the mirror, the seven ascertainment tantras, the six ascertainment tantras, and the twelve general ascertainment tantras and so forth🔽should be consulted in the extensive texts.

original: gzhung mdo tshhad mar lta bar bya'o/_/gzhung ngan grib ma lta ba'i long thug bzhin//
analyzed: gzhung mdo tshhad mar lta bar bya'o/_/gzhung ngan grib ma lta ba'i long thug bzhin//
translated: Like a blind man who sees only the shadows of bad texts,

original: mi lus ma 'dres gzhung nub rmongs don du/_/la shan me long 'di ltas bsod
analyzed: mi lus ma 'dres gzhung nub rmongs don du/_/la shan me long 'di ltas bsod
translated: for the sake of the confused who have lost the unadulterated human texts,🔽whatever merit there is in this mirror of the classifications

original: nams gang /_/'gro kun dngos po'i de nyid mngon byed shog_/las shan lta
analyzed: nams gang /_/'gro kun dngos po'i de nyid mngon byed shog_/las shan lta
translated: may it cause all beings to realize the suchness of entities.

original: ba'i sgron ma zhes bya ba/_bzhad  pa rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so//_//
analyzed: ba'i sgron ma zhes bya ba/_bzhad  pa rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so//_//
translated: The Lamp for the Classification of Karma and Views, composed by Shepa Dorje, is complete.

original: /_/_gtshang pa dag du
analyzed: /_/_gtshang pa dag du
translated: The Classification of the Four Tenet Systems
